sections.heading: Rules; amend; copies; distribution; posting
sections.text: The Jail Standards Board may, as it may deem proper, amend the rules, and such amended rules and their copies shall be disposed of in the same manner as provided in section 47-202.SourceLaws 1915, c. 208, ยง 3, p. 463;C.S.1922, ยง 3012;C.S.1929, ยง 47-117;R.S
